group_1.narration: ...I told them everything I knew about@the Witch that had brought us together.

group_1.textLeft: Have any of you ever heard of the curse@of the [textRed:locusts]?
Yes...@The curse causes insects like that to appear.

group_1.textRight: Oh...! [chara:301101:motion_000]Like a [textRed:plague of locusts]!@[chara:301101:motion_400]I read about them in a book once!
A plague of...what?@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]What are you guys talking about?
A huge swarm of locusts comes and@devours all the crops and everything!
At least, that's what happened in the@Bible, anyway...
Locusts have long troubled us in@Hong Kong, too.
...But, how are locusts and@Witches[chara:301201:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json] related to each other?

group_1.textLeft: Locusts move from place to@place eating everything in sight.
This Witch acts in much the same way.
Whenever it goes somewhere, disaster@follows soon after...
Eventually, it moves on to somewhere@else and the cycle repeats...

group_1.textRight: So you're saying that's what happened@to us...?

group_1.textLeft: The place I met Akira was close @to where the Witch was nesting.

group_1.textRight: I must have been chasing some of@that Witch's Familiars at the time...
She was looking for a new place@to operate from, wasn't she?

group_1.textLeft: This Witch brings disaster even when@she's searching for a new nest.
She was at the root of the land buying@scheme and burning of Natsume Books.
And once she nests somewhere, she returns@there often to keep the town miserable.
So I've been going around Kamihama,@checking every place she's known to appear.
However, there is a limit to how much I can@do by myself.
That's why I've gathered you all here today.

group_1.textRight: It's finally clear to me now...

group_1.textLeft: Then I will ask you all again...@Will you work with me to stop this Witch?
I am not asking you for a contract...[chara:300501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]but@an alliance.
